meanings.definition: To reveal one's thoughts or feelings
meanings.sent1: She unbosoms her worries to her best friend.
meanings.sent2: He often unbosoms his emotions through writing.
meanings.sent3: The character in the story finally unbosoms his secret to the group.
meanings.sent4: The sunset unbosoms its vibrant colors to the world.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting truly unbosoms the depth of his emotions.
